name: Frostfire Planet
description:
Frostfire Planet is a unique strategy game where you try to take over the world as the leader of Frost, Fire or Nature. Carefully decide what creatures to send into battle and their strategic positioning. Capture and hold key sections of the planet for bonus resources. Assist each wave of creatures with a variety of game-changing spells.

KEY FEATURES

  • Multi and single player deathmatch
  • Three very distinct races.
  • Fighter, tank, ranged, spellcaster, support, assassin and massive creatures.
  • Unique upgrades for every creature
  • Custom selection of spells and passives
  • Original map and gameplay
